a.content: \begin{aligned} &P\left( X <Y\right) \\ &=P\left( X=1,Y=2\right) +P\left( X=1,Y=3\right) +P\left( X=1,Y=4\right) +P\left( X=2,Y=3\right) +P\left( X=2,Y=4\right) +P\left( X=3,Y=4\right) \\ &=P_{X}\left( 1\right) P_{Y}\left( 2\right) +P_X \left( 1\right) P_{Y}\left( 3\right) +P_{X}\left( 1\right) P_{Y}\left( 4\right) +P_{X}\left( 2\right) P_{Y}\left( 3\right) +P_{X}\left( 2\right) P_{Y}\left( 4\right) +P_{X}\left( 3\right) P_{Y}\left( 4\right) \\ &=\dfrac{1}{4}\ast \dfrac{1}{6}+\dfrac{1}{4}\ast \dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{4}\ast \dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{8}\ast \dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{8}\ast \dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{2}\ast \dfrac{1}{3}\\ &=\dfrac{1}{24}+\dfrac{1}{12}+\dfrac{1}{12}+\dfrac{1}{24}+\dfrac{1}{24}+\dfrac{1}{6}\\ &=\dfrac{11}{24} \end{aligned}
